update jobhunter
jobhunter_id = #{record.jobhunterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobhunter_name = #{record.jobhunterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobhunter_real_name = #{record.jobhunterRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
